name: Kwame Nkrumah Mausoleum
description: A memorial park dedicated to Ghana's first President, Kwame Nkrumah.

name: Makola Market
description: A bustling market where locals buy and sell everything from clothes to food.

name: Jamestown Lighthouse
description: A colonial-era lighthouse with panoramic views of the city and coast.

description: A historical castle formerly used during colonial rule and as a seat of government.

name: W.E.B. DuBois Center
description: Museum and mausoleum of African-American scholar and civil rights activist W.E.B. DuBois.

name: Labadi Beach
description: Popular beach destination for both locals and tourists with music and food.

name: Aburi Botanical Gardens
description: A beautiful garden with exotic plants and a peaceful environment.
